titles.title: Authorizing the President to award posthumously the Medal of Honor or other appropriate military decoration to John Peter Manzi, killed in action on September 7, 1967, in the Republic of Vietnam.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Forces and Personnel.

bill.summary: 2/17/1993--Introduced. Authorizes and requests the President to award posthumously the Medal of Honor or other appropriate military decoration to John Peter Manzi for gallantry in action on September 7, 1967, in the Republic of Vietnam.
